attributes.action: Force KaiBo (@KaiBeaumont) on to Britain's Got Talent.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a campaign for the government to debate the matter in parliament that which relates to the forcible conscription of one 'King of Chavs' Kai Beaumont, on to terrestrial broadcasting show, Britain's Got Talent.

This would be a recognition of Britain's suburban culture and our nation's sense of self deprecation. The potential for exports will undoubtedly become self-evident.
